text-2.title: About Us
text-2.text: iCare Lite is responsive theme for Health / Doctor / Clinic / Medical Business related website. Theme has inbuilt theme options, custom widgets and sections. Get perfect, modern and professional website with no coding knowledge. Making your website your own is easier than ever before with iCare.
